item.title: Sunset Dolphin Watch Tour
item.description: Venture out into the Gulf of Mexico and enjoy a relaxing dolphin-watching tour from South Padre Island. Take a seat on the spacious vessel and keep your eyes peeled for pods of Atlantic bottlenose dolphins in their natural habitat. See the playful aquatic creatures swim alongside your boat and take in the scenery of the Texas coast while you sail.

image.alt: Sunset Dolphin Watch Tour

item.title: Eco and Dolphin Watch Tour of South Padre Island
item.description: Watch for the Atlantic bottlenose dolphins that thrive along the coast of South Padre Island on a 1.5-hour wildlife boat tour from Sea Ranch Marina. Cruise past the U.S. Coast Guard Station and Boca Chica Beach, with a comfortable seat on a wildlife-watching boat that’s equipped with a wildlife-safe viewing net so you can see South Padre sea life up close.

image.alt: Eco and Dolphin Watch Tour of South Padre Island

item.title: Parasailing Adventure in South Padre Island
item.description: A parasailing trip over South Padre Island is a popular choice for adventurous travelers. Once in the air, take in sweeping views of the island and surrounding natural landscape rarely seen by visitors or locals alike. Your guide ensures a smooth takeoff and landing, as well as tips on what wildlife you may be able to spot, from bottlenose dolphins to osprey hawks.

image.alt: Parasailing Adventure in South Padre Island

item.title: Port Brownsville Half-Day Boat Tour
item.description: Learn about everything from the South Texas shrimping industry to the history of Brownsville with this 4-hour cruise. You'll also get a glimpse of Starbase, a rocket factory and launch facility created by Elon Musk's SpaceX. If you’re lucky, you may even spot Atlantic bottle-nose dolphins or migratory birds right from the deck. As an added bonus, coffee, donuts, and shrimp cocktail will be served, free of charge.

image.alt: Port Brownsville Half-Day Boat Tour

item.title: Banana Boat South Padre Island
item.description: Going to South Padre Island and not going in the water is like visiting New York City without visiting a museum. This South Padre Island Banana Boat Experience lets you take up to six people on an unpowered, inflatable recreational banana boat. Enjoy cruising the waters on the boat, taking in sights and having fun. Life jackets are provided for a safe day on the water.

image.alt: Banana Boat South Padre Island

item.title: Private Sunset Cruise South Padre Island
item.description: Set sail at one of the best times of day—sunset—on a South Padre Island cruise aboard a comfortable private 6 passenger boat. Enjoy beautiful views of the skyline as you make your way along the Texas Gulf Coast, and keep an eye out for bottle nose dolphins, seabirds, and other wildlife. This private yacht charter is ideal for couples, family, friends, or those celebrating a special occasion.

image.alt: Private Sunset Cruise South Padre Island

item.title: Private Bay Fishing South Padre Island
item.description: Benefit from personalized attention on this private fishing charter on the Laguna Madre from South Padre Island. With your private group of up to six passengers, you'll head out to the best secret fishing spots to catch local fish such as sheepshead, drum, whiting, and sand trout. Depending on your level of experience, you'll get instruction from the captain or be left to your own devices.

image.alt: Private Bay Fishing South Padre Island

item.title: South Padre Island Sandcastling Experience
item.description: Sand sculpting on South Padre Island is an art form. Learn tips and tricks for building sandcastles like a pro during a hands-on sandcastle lesson—a great choice for families with kids. This activity takes place on the beach most convenient to your location. Plus, choose from a 1- or 2-hour lesson and multiple times to best suit your schedule. Sand sculpting tools are provided and can be used throughout your stay.

image.alt: South Padre Island Sandcastling Experience

item.title: Bay Fishing South Padre Island
item.description: Keen fishers will love the opportunity to spend half a day out on the water on a fishing tour of South Padre Island. Depending on the season and conditions you may be able to catch sand trout, whiting, shark, sheepshead, and more. Bring your own gear or use what's provided. A valid Texas Saltwater Fishing License is required.

image.alt: Bay Fishing South Padre Island

item.title: Private Historical Wildlife and Dolphin Cruise South Padre Island
item.description: Share the Gulf of Mexico waters with bottlenose dolphins, pelicans, and more on a private 90-minute boat tour from South Padre Island. The private 6-passenger vessel makes for an ideal experience for families or friend groups. Between wildlife encounters, learn the storied past of the area. Discover the history of the native Karankawa tribe, local shipwrecks, and more.

image.alt: Private Historical Wildlife and Dolphin Cruise South Padre Island

item.title: Fireworks Cruise with Dolphin Watch in Laguna Madre Bay
item.description: Get ready for an unforgettable journey into the heart of nature, where sightings of the magnificent Atlantic bottlenose dolphins are a year-round spectacle in South Padre Island! Step aboard and let Isla Tours whisk you away to the dolphins' natural playground. Our one-and-a-half-hour adventure is not just a tour; it's a voyage into the enchanting Laguna Madre, where the waters are teeming with life and excitement. Feel the thrill as these playful dolphins dance around our boat, offering you a rare glimpse into their world. But that’s not all! This family-friendly party cruise promises more than just dolphin sightings. As the day winds down, you’ll be treated to a breathtaking South Texas sunset, painting the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink, casting a magical glow over the water. And just when you think it can't get any better, you'll have a front-row seat to a spectacular fireworks display over the bay, lighting up the night in a dazzling array of colors!

image.alt: Fireworks Cruise with Dolphin Watch in Laguna Madre Bay

item.title: 45-Minute Jetski Rental in South Padre Island
item.description: Boat rides can be packed with people trying to see the sights from the water. Choose this alternative South Padre Island Jet Ski Experience and see the same views without being pushed around by the crowd. This Jet Ski experience allows you to ride by yourself or with just one other as you explore the waters of Laguna Madre.

image.alt: 45-Minute Jetski Rental in South Padre Island

item.title: North Bay Snorkel
item.description: Explore the waters around South Padre Island and keep an eye out for local dolphins on this boat cruise. With a small group of just six passengers or fewer, you'll get personalized attention from your captain and plenty of time to ask questions. Listen to wildlife- and history-focused commentary, which lets you learn lots more about the island and its ecosystem than you would simply exploring on your own.

image.alt: North Bay Snorkel

item.title: 3 Hours Snorkeling Excursion in South Padre Island
item.description: Our 3 hour excursion is perfect for families and guests of all ages! All equipment is provided. Work up an appetite and enjoy our legendary angus burgers and hot dogs. Don’t forget to BYOB!

image.alt: 3 Hours Snorkeling Excursion in South Padre Island

item.title: The South Padre Shuffle Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Immerse yourself in the culture and city of Texas’ South Padre Island during this South Padre Island Scavenger Hunt. A remote host will help you begin your scavenger hunt and let you in on the rules of play before you start. Once you’re up to speed, you’ll enjoy doing creative challenges, detective hunts, social experiments and dares, and learning about the city’s culture. A fun way to get acquainted with South Padre Island.

image.alt: The South Padre Shuffle Scavenger Hunt

item.title: 1.5-Hour Historical Jet Ski Tour in South Padre Island
item.description: Combine a fun Jet Ski ride with a bit of history during this tour of South Padre Island. Join a small group and zip along the blue-green waters to several points of interest including Port Isabel, Brownsville, and even South Bay, home to the Space X Rocket Launch facility. While you ride, your guide sheds light on the history of the area.

image.alt: 1.5-Hour Historical Jet Ski Tour in South Padre Island

item.title: Learn to Surf on South Padre Island
item.description:
Not many people imagine Texas to have beautiful beaches, much less waves to surf! This activity is unique because it allows travelers to learn how to surf in Texas, where the waves are warm, mellow, and great for beginners.
Learn to surf is a life-changing experience! You will see and feel the ocean like you have never before.

image.alt: Learn to Surf on South Padre Island

item.title: 8-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers
item.description: Get around South Padre Island like a local: on a golf cart. This 8-hour rental comes with your choice of 4-seater or 6-seater vehicle to suit your group. Cruise the streets of South Padre by gas-powered golf cart, with LED lights and a bluetooth-connected sound system. From beach to bay, the possibilities are endless.

image.alt: 8-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers

item.title: 24-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers
item.description: Ride through South Padre Island in style with your own golf cart rental. After picking up your vehicle, set off to explore the island stopping at the beach, cruising through Isla Blanca Park, or stopping to observe the sea turtles. The golf carts have been retrofitted with LED lights, Bluetooth speakers, and large tires for a fun and comfortable experience.

image.alt: 24-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers

item.title: Alternate Reality Scavenger Hunt in South Padre Island
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you through your phone.
We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures include a tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, learning tool, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues—for points! Regardless of their score, they enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard. They can race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors that day.
Get ready to learn about sustainability, discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

image.alt: Alternate Reality Scavenger Hunt in South Padre Island

item.title: Private Professional Vacation Photoshoot in South Padre Island
item.description:
Get ready for an unforgettable photographic journey through South Padre Island iconic destinations! We’ll guide you on a relaxed exploration of the city most photogenic landmarks, showcasing the best South Padre Island has to offer.
Alongside our professional photography services, we’re thrilled to share insider tips to enrich your holiday experience. You can choose between a 30-minute or 1-hour photoshoot, allowing you to customise your experience to best suit your needs. Join us as we uncover South Padre Island hidden gems and well-kept secrets, all while capturing the unforgettable moments of your vacation. We can’t wait to meet you and embark on this adventure together!

image.alt: Private Professional Vacation Photoshoot in South Padre Island

item.title: 4-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers
item.description: Explore South Padre Island with a golf cart rental, perfect for groups of up to six passengers. Cruise through Isla Blanca Park, take in a breathtaking sunset over the bay or swing by to visit the famous sea turtles. From the sandy beaches to the serene bay, this golf cart rental offers a convenient and exciting way to discover the island at your own pace. With endless possibilities, you’ll experience South Padre like a true local.

image.alt: 4-Hour Golf Cart Rental in South Padre Island for 6 Passengers

item.title: Brownsville City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Use an app to survive a zombie apocalypse in Brownsville. In Zombie Scavengers, explore the city however you'd like to search for items needed to survive a zombie apocalypse. You'll get points for finding these items. You can also do some zombie themed challenges for points on the app as well. Strategize in order to get the most points and survive the apocalypse. Your remote host will be there for you via chat if you need anything. Can you survive the apocalypse in Brownsville?

image.alt: Brownsville City Scavenger Hunt Excursion by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Explore Brownsville Scavenger Hunt
item.description: Embark on a city-wide scavenger hunt of Brownsville using just a smartphone app. Roam the downtown area, complete tasks, and try to find over 100 objects across town. There are 13 categories of objects, each varying in difficulty, as well as additional challenges for extra scores. A remote guide is your virtual companion, offering assistance, encouragement, and hints so you can aim to top the leaderboard.

image.alt: Explore Brownsville Scavenger Hunt
